alert.note: Alert for Hamilton; Northern Herkimer (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 18 at 4:27AM EDT until March 19 at 8:00PM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 5 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 8 PM EDT SUNDAY... * WHAT...Lake effect snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 8 inches. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Northern Herkimer County and northwestern Hamilton County. Highest snowfall amounts expected north of Route 28. * WHEN...From 5 PM Saturday to 8 PM EDT Sunday. * IMPACTS...Snow may lead to slippery travel conditions, especially on untreated surfaces. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snowfall rates within the lake effect band may exceed 1 to even 2 inch per hour at times, especially tonight.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.
